messages.zh: 第三关（前）
messages.tl: Third pass (front)

messages.zh: 远处那个，是不是......
messages.tl: In the distance, is it...

messages.zh: ......是ace的小队吗？
messages.tl: ... is the ace team?

messages.zh: 头儿，你怎么在这？
messages.tl: Head, how are you here?

messages.zh: 我担心你们遭到整合运动封锁，所以赶来支援。
messages.tl: I am worried that you have been blocked by the Reunion Movement, so I came to support.

messages.zh: 你来了？
messages.tl: You came?

messages.zh: 杜宾。
messages.tl: Dobermann.

messages.zh: 临光那边，不要紧？
messages.tl: Nearl, don't worry?

messages.zh: 现在还没有能难倒她的事。
messages.tl: There is still no way to stump her.

messages.zh: 而且，和我想的一样，你们遇到麻烦了。
messages.tl: And, as I thought, you are in trouble.

messages.zh: 是的。整合运动发动了突然袭击。
messages.tl: Yes. The Reunion Movement launched a sudden attack.

messages.zh: 我们那边也是。幸亏临光指挥得当，省了许多功夫。
messages.tl: We are there too. Fortunately, Bearing has a good command and saved a lot of effort.
This way...oh...!

messages.zh: 你受伤了？让我来处理......
messages.tl: You are hurt? Let me deal with...

messages.zh: 麻烦你了......
messages.tl: sorry to bother you......

messages.zh: 都怪切城那个感染者诊所，叫什么......阿撒兹勒。
messages.tl: I blame the Infected Person clinic in the city, what is it... Asazil.

messages.zh: 如果他们当时肯分享情报，或者愿意合作的话......
messages.tl: If they are willing to share information or are willing to cooperate...

messages.zh: 我们就不会陷入如此被动的境地了！
messages.tl: We will not fall into such a passive situation!

messages.zh: 也不全是这样......
messages.tl: Not all that is...

messages.zh: 阿米娅，当时和他们交涉时你也在场吧？
messages.tl: Amiya, were you there when you were dealing with them?

messages.zh: 他们那傲慢冷漠的态度，我真是......
messages.tl: Their arrogant and indifferent attitude, I am really...

messages.zh: 气不打一处来！
messages.tl: Gas does not hit one place!

messages.zh: 不能怪罪他们。
messages.tl: Can't blame them.

messages.zh: 头儿也这么说......
messages.tl: The same is true of the head...

messages.zh: 感染者本就很难相信别人。
messages.tl: Infected Person is hard to believe in others.

messages.zh: 经历那么多苦难......当然会变得保守与顽固。
messages.tl: Experience so much suffering... Of course it will become conservative and stubborn.

messages.zh: 因为不提防他人，就会被他人伤害。
messages.tl: Because you are not guarded against others, you will be hurt by others.

messages.zh: 就连感染者都没法互相信任。
messages.tl: Even Infected Person can't trust each other.

messages.zh: 在这片土地上，哪怕只是想依偎取暖、独善其身......都很困难。
messages.tl: In this land, even if I just want to rely on heating and being alone, it is very difficult.

messages.zh: 至少他们那样做......我能理解，也能原谅。
messages.tl: At least they do that... I can understand and forgive.

messages.zh: 像罗德岛这样不分彼此，或是整合运动那样狂热的排外拥内，都很少见。
messages.tl: It’s rare to see Rhodes Island like each other, or the fanatical exclusion of the Reunion Movement.

messages.zh: 杜宾教官。
messages.tl: Dobermann instructor.

messages.zh: 我能理解你的怒气......也能理解那个小诊所的苦衷。
messages.tl: I can understand your anger... I can understand the hardships of that small clinic.

messages.zh: 任何人都无法逃离这漩涡，想必他们也面临着种种难题。
messages.tl: No one can escape this whirlpool, and they must face various problems.

messages.zh: 但在解决其他人的难题前——
messages.tl: But before solving the problems of others -

messages.zh: 我们先要解决自己的。
messages.tl: We must first solve our own problems.

messages.zh: 七点钟方向，整合运动巡逻小队。动作快！
messages.tl: At 7 o'clock, the Reunion Movement patrol team. Fast action!

messages.zh: 敌人！戒备！
messages.tl: enemy! alert!
